sqls.sql: SELECT id, name, pwd, email, mobile_number, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM user_ent where status = 'AT0001' and id = ?
SELECT id, name, pwd, email, mobile_number, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM user_ent where status = 'AT0001' and name = ?;
